Beast Herder Tunatun: Oh, really? Well, I guess you're up to the job! As you probably know, it's not easy to tame a wild animal. Unless they're given the proper training, they can be quite dangerous! When they're young they hardly present a risk, but the danger grows as they do... Are you sure you want to do this? [Quest _020_BringUpWithLove reply_2|"Yes."]
